item.description: About Me Bula! I am originally from the beautiful islands of Fiji. After growing up in Fiji, studying in Mokpo, South Korea, Zurich, Switzerland, and Trento, Italy, I currently live and work in the beautiful city of Chicago, USA. Education Before joining Amber Agriculture in Chicago as a Wireless Systems Engineer, I obtained my Ph.D. in Information and Communication Technology from the University of Trento, Italy under the supervision of Dr.

Contact Me If you want to get in touch with me concerning my research or any other concern please feel free to contact me via Email or LinkedIn. I will reply to your request (at times with a bit delay) and I am looking forward to making new interesting and promising collaborations! At this point, I want to thank you for visiting my website. Private Consulting Available for consulting in Internet of Things, including: system implementations in embedded C, low-power wireless protocols, consulting, and code development using Contiki-NG.

Open-Source Projects I have really become a huge believer in the power of open source - Peter Levine I have worked on several topics in wireless sensor and actuator networks for enabling low-power IoT, mainly wake-up radio based communication protocols, design of WaCo simulator, an Open Source Hardware-Software Platform for Enabling Rapid Research in LPWANs: KRATOS, NB-IoT, and other debugging tools. Source code for some of my projects can be found on my GitHub profile or my former research group page.
